item.description:
Let's kick Maine Ruby back off with meetings the 4th Thursday of every
month at 7pm. We also have a new site in the works and a twitter
account to follow: @maineruby

This month's Maine Ruby will be hosted at the residence of Adam and
Renae Bair (118 Tucker Ave, Portland, Maine) with pizza and beer
provided by Intridea.

There is no formal topic or speaker planned, but anyone is welcome to
come with questions, thoughts, or projects to show off.
Maine Ruby - Fall reboot

Thursday October 28th @ 7pm
118 Tucker Ave, Portland, Maine
Hope to see everyone there,

Google Group
http://groups.google....

group.name: The Portland Maine Ruby Meetup Group

item.name: Maine Ruby - Fall reboot
